quotes.quote: I’m on a roller coaster that only goes up, my friend.
Starting anything is a roller coaster with the highest highs and lowest lows.
Once you know where the roller coaster is going, are you in for the ride?
God put us here, on this carnival ride. We close our eyes never knowing where it'll take us next.
Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
Stay in your seat come times of trouble. Its only people who jump off the roller coaster who get hurt.
It's kinda like being on a roller coaster. If you don't get on the ride, you won't experience the adventure.
There cannot be ups in a roller coaster ride unless there are downs.
Life is like a roller coaster. You can either scream every time there is a bump or you can throw your hands up and enjoy the ride
With peaks of joy and valleys of heartache, life is a roller coaster ride that's both scary and exciting at the same time the rise and fall of which defines our journey.
My life has been a roller coaster ride, but somehow I've always been able to land on my feet and still play the guitar.
Many traders ride an emotional roller coaster and miss the essential element of winning the management of their emotions.
Just close your eyes and enjoy the roller coaster that is life.
Roller coasters are like math you can ride.
